metadata.title: NEANDERco — AI-Powered Experiential Content
metadata.description: We transform offline spaces with AI-driven experiential content. Pop-ups, festivals, exhibitions, concerts — NEANDERco.ltd designs unforgettable experiences.
metadata.keywords: AI content, experiential content, pop-up store, interactive media, AI fragrance, photo booth, spatial design, NEANDERco
metadata.ogDescription: 190+ events. 10,000+ visitors. Setting a new standard in AI experiential content.

hero.description:
Fragrance, imagery, light, sound — we engineer sensory experiences
with AI and bring unforgettable moments to offline spaces.

heroGame.title: SENSE RUSH
heroGame.description: Collect sensory particles to design the ultimate experience space. Avoid the grey noise!
heroGame.howTo: Move the collector with your mouse or finger to catch particles
heroGame.aiMessage: Based on your sensory collection data, this combination can design an experience space with 42-min avg. dwell time and 87% social share rate. Want to make it real?
heroGame.ctaQuote: Get a Quote for This Experience

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Unforgettable Offline Experiences Powered by AI
services.description: We plan experiential AI content that makes your brand shine. We create AI experiences that visitors can participate in and enjoy in physical spaces.
services.heroTagline: What experience shall we create for you?
services.pillarsSubtitle: We design brand-tailored experiences across 5 AI experience categories
services.industrySubtitle: Explore AI experience concepts designed for your industry
services.ctaTitle: Your brand is the star of the next experience
services.ctaSubtitle: The AI experience you imagine — NEANDER makes it real
services.noExperiences: No experiences for this combination. Try a different filter.
services.ctaInquirySubtitle: NEANDER designs tailored experiences for your brand

aiPhoto.name: AI Photo Experience

aiImmersive.name: AI Immersive Experience
aiImmersive.tagline: The entire space becomes an AI experience
aiImmersive.description: Large-scale content using projection mapping, LED displays, and interactive installations

step3.name: Space Design & Installation
step3.description: We design the space and install equipment

step4.name: On-site Operations
step4.description: We take responsibility for on-site operations

beauty01.name: AI Personal Color Diagnosis
beauty01.oneLiner: Find your personal color and get matched product recommendations by AI
beauty01.description: An experience where a camera analyzes your skin tone to diagnose your personal color season and recommend brand products

processSteps.title: Skin Tone Capture
processSteps.description: High-resolution camera captures your skin tone

processSteps.title: AI Color Analysis
processSteps.description: AI analyzes skin tone data to diagnose your personal color

processSteps.title: Results & Recommendations
processSteps.description: Receive diagnosis results and personalized color product recommendations

processSteps.title: AI Precision Analysis
processSteps.description: Analyzes 5 indicators: pores, hydration, wrinkles, tone, elasticity

processSteps.title: Custom Report
processSteps.description: Outputs personalized skincare routine and product recommendation report

acscent.title: AC'SCENT — AI Fragrance Experience
acscent.description: AI analyzes your taste and personality to recommend a fragrance uniquely yours.

photobooth.title: AI Photo Booth
photobooth.description: AI-generated art. 100+ style filters and brand-tailored designs create keepsake images for visitors.

mediaArt.description: AI media art that responds to visitors' movement, sound, and touch, transforming spaces into living art.

spatialDesign.description: We design spaces where brand identity and AI content converge.

rental.description: Everything you need for AI content operations in one package.

custom.description: Fully bespoke AI interactive content from concept to operations.

stores.label: AC'SCENT Stores
stores.description: Sinchon, Wau, and ID flagship locations

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Stories Told Through Experience
portfolio.description: Explore the sensory experiences designed by NEANDERco.

crossTheLine.title: CROSS THE LINE — Immersive Exhibition
crossTheLine.description: An experience that transcends boundaries. An interactive media art exhibition where visitors become part of the artwork. We built an immersive space using motion tracking and AI generative art.

acscentSinchon.title: AC'SCENT Sinchon — Flagship Store Launch
acscentSinchon.description: Your signature scent, recommended by AI. We opened the first AC'SCENT flagship store in Sinchon, setting a new standard for AI fragrance experiences. From personal scent profiling to on-site blending, a full sensory journey.

jecheonMusicFilm.title: Jecheon International Music & Film Festival — AI Experience Zone
jecheonMusicFilm.description: Adding AI to the intersection of music and film. We operated an AI photo booth and interactive sound-visual experience zone for festival-goers, delivering a new kind of festival engagement.

seoulWritersFestival.title: Seoul Writers' Festival — Interactive Exhibition
seoulWritersFestival.description: Where literature meets technology. We presented an interactive installation that transforms authors' text into AI-generated visual language. Visitors' voices became real-time visual art.

ansanScienceFestival.title: Ansan International Science Film Festival — AI Experience Zone
ansanScienceFestival.description: Where science meets imagination. We planned and operated interactive content that lets visitors experience the principles of AI technology firsthand. A hands-on zone that turns science into play.

acscentWau.title: AC'SCENT Wau — Second Store Opening
acscentWau.description: A fragrance space infused with Hongdae character. We opened the second AC'SCENT store on Wausan-ro in Hongdae, featuring a locally inspired limited fragrance line and an upgraded AI profiling system.

acscentId.title: AC'SCENT ID — Third Store Launch
acscentId.description: A fragrance that defines you. At AC'SCENT ID, our third store, a more refined AI expresses your identity through scent. Deep personality analysis and premium ingredients create a truly personal fragrance.
acscentId.result: Premium line launch, 35% increase in average spend

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: The People Who Design Sensory Experiences

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: By combining AI technology with creative sensibility, we deliver unforgettable offline experiences to people everywhere.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: As a global leader in experiential AI content, we are setting the standard for a new experience industry where technology and emotion coexist.

ceo.name: Yoo Jae-young
ceo.title: CEO & Founder
ceo.quote: We don't build technology — we design experiences. AI is a tool; the real value lies in the emotions people feel. That single moment of experience creates an unforgettable connection between a brand and a person.
ceo.bio: Founder and CEO of NEANDERco.ltd. Pioneering new experiential value in offline spaces by combining AI technology with creative direction.

2023.title: AC'SCENT 1st Store
events: Official launch of AI fragrance experience service

2024.title: Festival Market Entry
events: Jecheon International Music & Film Festival AI zone

2025.title: AC'SCENT ID Launch
events: Ansan International Science Film Festival AI zone

experience.title: Experience First
experience.description: Technology serves the experience, not the other way around. Every project starts with one question: what will people feel?

innovation.title: Relentless Innovation
innovation.description: We explore new possibilities at the frontier of AI technology. Never settling, always imagining the next experience.

collaboration.title: Co-Created Value
collaboration.description: Through close collaboration with our clients, we understand the essence of their brand and design the optimal experience to match.

impact.title: Measurable Impact
impact.description: Emotion can be measured. Visitor count, dwell time, social sharing rate — we prove our results through data.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: AI engineers, creative directors, spatial designers, and project managers working as one team to craft sensory experiences.

memory.question: What scent lives in your most cherished memory?

personality.question: How would the people around you describe you?

freshCitrus.name: Fresh Citrus Blend
freshCitrus.description: A scent for your bright, vibrant energy. The zest of bergamot and grapefruit harmonizes with green tea notes in this uplifting composition.
freshCitrus.notes: Top: Bergamot, Grapefruit | Middle: Green Tea, Jasmine | Base: White Musk

woodyAmber.name: Woody Amber Signature
woodyAmber.description: A scent for your deep, intellectual allure. The warmth of sandalwood and amber is grounded by the strength of cedar in this timeless composition.
woodyAmber.notes: Top: Pink Pepper, Cardamom | Middle: Cedarwood, Iris | Base: Sandalwood, Amber

floralMusk.name: Floral Musk Soft
floralMusk.description: A scent for your gentle, emotional nature. A tender blend of white florals and musk that captures delicate sensibility.
floralMusk.notes: Top: Pear, Freesia | Middle: Peony, Rose | Base: White Musk, Cashmere Wood

oceanBreeze.name: Ocean Breeze Aqua
oceanBreeze.description: A scent for your free, refreshing spirit. The freshness of the sea and mineral notes come together to evoke a wide-open sense of liberation.
oceanBreeze.notes: Top: Sea Salt, Lime | Middle: Marine Notes, Lavender | Base: Driftwood, Ambergris

darkRose.name: Dark Rose Intense
darkRose.description: A scent for your bold, captivating presence. The richness of Damask rose meets wood and spice in a composition that commands attention.
darkRose.notes: Top: Saffron, Black Pepper | Middle: Damask Rose, Geranium | Base: Oud, Patchouli, Leather

vanillaDream.name: Vanilla Dream Ancien
vanillaDream.description: A scent for your warm, nurturing soul. The sweetness of vanilla and the velvety depth of tonka bean create a comforting sanctuary.
vanillaDream.notes: Top: Bergamot, Almond | Middle: Vanilla, Tonka Bean | Base: Benzoin, White Musk

cookie.title: Cookie Notice
cookie.description: NEANDERco uses cookies to provide a better experience.

q1.question: Can you handle events of any size?
q1.answer: Absolutely. From intimate private events to large-scale festivals, we offer tailored solutions for every scale and budget. We will work with you to design the optimal experience for your needs.

q2.question: How is pricing determined?
q2.answer: Pricing considers event type, duration, location, selected services, and expected attendance. Submit a quote request with basic details and we will send you a detailed proposal within 1–2 business days.

q3.question: How far in advance should I plan?
q3.answer: It varies by service, but we generally recommend reaching out 4–6 weeks before your event. For custom interactive content, we suggest a lead time of 8 weeks or more.

q4.question: Do you operate outside of Seoul or internationally?
q4.answer: Yes. We have experience with events outside Seoul and internationally. We develop logistics and installation plans tailored to each venue, wherever it may be.

q5.question: Can I visit an AC'SCENT store?
q5.answer: Of course! We currently operate three stores: Sinchon, Wau, and ID. No reservation required — walk in anytime to experience AI fragrance profiling in person.

q6.question: What does the data analytics report include?
q6.answer: Our reports cover visitor count, average dwell time, top-performing content, social share count, satisfaction survey results, and more. These insights help you plan even more impactful future events.

demos.sectionSubtitle: Experience a mini version of this AI service
